    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void ClientService.checkAge​(Client client)
    tests if the client is 18 years or more
    private void ReservationService.checkDateConditions​(Reservation reservation)
    tests if the new reservation matches the conditions : 1. a vehicle can not be rented more than 7 days 2. the date of end must me after the date of beginning of the reservation
    private void ReservationService.checkDisponibility​(Reservation reservation)
    tests if the vehicle is not already rented during a given period
    private void ReservationService.checkDurationUnder30Days​(Reservation reservation)
    tests if the total duration of reservation of a given Vehicle without break is lower than 30 days

    gets and sends to another functions the words we need to test
    private void VehicleService.checkNbSeats​(Vehicle vehicle)
    checks if the number of seats respects the conditions (between 2 and 9 seats)

    private void VehicleService.checkNoEmpty​(Vehicle vehicle)

    tests if the size of the word is more than 3, which is a minimum for Client first and last names

    tests if the word is composed only by letters and spaces, but not special characters or numbers
